description: Ce besoin vise le Service correctionnel du Canada. ...
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Dental Laboratory Services

**Reference Number:** cb-535-18692583
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 21201-25-4796765
**Publication Date:** 2024-07-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-29T13:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-07-29
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-03-31

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** None
**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
**Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick, Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity:** Correctional Service Canada
**Contact Information:**
- **Name**: Sylvie Gallant
- **Email**: Sylvie.Gallant@csc-scc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (506) 378-8724
- **Address**: 1045 Main Street, Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada

**Notice Description (English):**
The Correctional Service of Canada is requesting a standing offer for dental laboratory services for four institutions in New Brunswick and Nova Scotia. The successful bidder will provide dental laboratory services as needed to institutions of the Correctional Service of Canada.

**Notice Description (French):**
Le Service correctionnel du Canada demande une offre à commandes pour des services de laboratoire dentaire pour les quatre établissementsen Nouveau brunswick et en Nouvelle-Ecosse. Le prestataire retenue fournira les services de laboratoire dentaire sur demande et selon les besoins.

**Bid Requirements:**
Bidder can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys/tender opportunities website. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Note to bidders: after contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Documents:**
The complete statement of work and evaluation criteria, as well as associated documents, are available on the Canada buys/tender opportunities website. All interested suppliers may submit a bid. Bidder can obtain the required documents and participate in this bid
